ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
recipe: Combine evaporated milk, condensed milk and whipped topping in a blender and blend in pieces of bread until smooth.
Pour mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish or two plastic ice cube trays, sprinkle with cardamom and freeze for 8 hours or overnight.
